related_questions.question: The following words are adverbs of manner except, artinyaa
Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a....daydesi:yes. lets play outdoor

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a sunny day

Desi: yes. lets play outdoor!

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan kata sifat (Adjective) yaitu sunny yang berarti cerah dan berfungsi untuk menjelaskan kata benda (Noun) day. Karena hari cerah, maka Desi mengajak untuk bermain di luar.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?    a. Is
b. am
c. was
d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now
a. is 
b. Are 
c. Am
d. Be

Pliss bantu Lagi Kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

Semoga membantu ya.
